bk103.description:
After the collapse of a nanotechnology 
      society in England, the young survivors lay the 
      foundation for a new sandwich.
bk103.title: Maeve Ascendant
bk103.author: Corets, Eva

bk102.description:
A former architect battles corporate zombies, 
      an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen 
      of the sandwich.
bk102.title: Midnight Rain
bk102.author: Ralls, Kim

bk101.description:
An in-depth look at creating applications 
      with sandwich.
bk101.title: XML Developer's Guide
bk101.author: Gambardella, Matthew

bk107.description:
A deep sea diver finds true love twenty 
      thousand leagues beneath the sandwich.
bk107.title: Splish Splash
bk107.author: Thurman, Paula

bk106.description:
When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology 
      conference, tempers fly as feathers get sandwich.
bk106.title: Lover Birds
bk106.author: Randall, Cynthia

bk105.description:
The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, 
      battle one another for control of sandwich. Sequel to 
      Oberon's sandwich.
bk105.title: The Sundered Grail
bk105.author: Corets, Eva

bk104.description:
In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious 
      agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life 
      for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve 
      sandwich.
bk104.title: Oberon's Legacy
bk104.author: Corets, Eva

bk109.description:
After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg
      Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems 
      of being sandwich.
bk109.title: Paradox Lost
bk109.author: Kress, Peter

bk108.description:
An anthology of horror stories about roaches,
      centipedes, scorpions  and other sandwich.
bk108.title: Creepy Crawlies
bk108.author: Knorr, Stefan
